inscription: Watching the clouds, we gather herbs / loving their hidden fragrance; / Drinking sake, we play the qin / and chant in the evening cool. / Those who have come to dwell in the riverside huts / have limitless pleasure; / Part of the joy of getting drunk / is that it makes us feel at home. (SA)

title: Pouring Wine at Dusk at the Riverside Dwellings
